### Chart A

```{r}
p <- latest() %>% 
  plot_ly(
    lat = ~Lat,
    lon = ~Long,
    marker = list(color = 'red', size = ~log(Cas), sizeref=0.1, opacity=0.4),
    type = 'scattermapbox',
    hovertext = ~State) %>%
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = 'carto-positron',
      zoom = 1.5,
      center = list(lon = 12, lat= 30))
  )

p
```
